sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useAuth } from '../functions/auth/authContext' import axios from 'axios' import '../css/pages/userInfos.scss' import TopBar from '../components/topBar' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../images/avatar.jpg' function UserInfos() { const {logout, token} = useAuth() const [userInfos, setUserInfos] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { if (token) { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/userinfos', { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, }) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) setUserInfos(res.data[0]) console.log(userInfos) }) .catch(err => { console.error('Error fetching user info', err) }) } }, [token]) useEffect(() => { if (userInfos) { console.log(userInfos) } }, [userInfos]) return (
logout()}/>
